view.story_note: you are in a room. there's a door on the north side, and a hallway on the east. you wake up. someone's whispering, can you hear me...?

lockedBox.description: there's a box here on the table
lockedBox.letter: by the time you read this, I shall be gone. and so will you!

hidden_notes.note: there's a code written under the table: 663!
